name: Flip Block
description:
Flip Block is a new twist in the classic falling blocks game. Play with challenging 5 and 6 blocks shape. Clear lines to get highest score.

You don't have time pressure in this game. Just tap to rotate, drag and drop the jewel or woody shapes. The shapes will drop down in classic mode and rise up like bubble shooter in 1010 mode. But it's hard and fun to master and get higher score. It's an addictive game to train your brain.

Features:
- Unlimited levels
- Classic and 1010 Mode
- Classic and 1010 Casual Mode: play casually without 6 blocks hardest shapes
- Zen Mode: play in a small area (8x8) without rotation and super power
- Magic, Flip and Undo power ups

Gameplay:
- Tap the block to rotate
- Drag and drop to stack the blocks
- Fill and clear horizontal lines of blocks
- No time pressure
- basic shapes and advance shapes
- You have 3 jewel or woody shapes to choose logically in one turn
- You can drop the blocks into holes

DOWNLOAD for FREE now and compete with your friends in the Game Center!
